ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is certainly a Sign in that for the muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Indeed there is a portent in this for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily there is a Sign in this for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In this there is evidence (of the Truth) for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed in this are signs for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Surely, there is indeed a sign in that for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely there is a sign in this for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely in that is a sign for believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! therein is indeed a portent for believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: surely in this there is a sign for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily in that is a sign for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and there is indeed a sign in that for the faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold! in this is a sign for those who believed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Surely! Therein is indeed a sign for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, in that there is a sign for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Surely in that is a sign for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:77] There is indeed a sign, a lesson, in that for believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! Therein) in their destruction (is indeed a portent) a lesson (for believers).
